# Keto Broccoli Salad

Bacony, and mayonaissey. If you're crazy enough to be on Keto this might take your mind off of it.

## Ingredients

* 2 heads broccoli
* 1/2 cup cheese
* 1/4 red onion
* 3 slices bacon
* 2 tbsp chives
* 1/4 cup toasted sliced almonds

### Dressing

* 2/3 cup mayonaisse
* 3 tbsp apple cider vinegar
* 1 tbsp Dijon mustard


## Method

Boil broccoli florets in salt water for 1-2 minutes. Combine dressing ingredients and season.

Grill or fry bacon until crispy and crumble/chop. Mix everyhing in a bowl and toss to combine.
